content: Best epub reader so far. No pain points to look for another app. I rarely buy paid apps but went out of my way to pay for Pro just to say thank you 🙂

It wont launch
replyContent: Hi, the actual Pro app acts as a license for the free Lithium app. Launch Lithium like normal and you should have Pro. You can confirm this by opening the drawer and checking if it says "Lithium" or "Lithium Pro"

content: Bought the pro version only to support the developer, the free version itself was already excellent. No ads, fast loading, simple to use, it just sometimes has a weird view with epub that have some image in it.

i bought the pro version so i can sync between my phone and my tablet. but when i want to sync it, it demands me to pay for it again in the tablet. looks like its been a long lasting problem that just need a little bit of patience (to wait until foogle cache is gone). overall good product i like it

Mostly a great reader. TTS would be a great edition. Also: Why cant I re-order the categories? At least by renaming into a-z order. Pls GET RID OF DELETE BOOK FROM DEVICE BY DEFAULT!!!!!!! I LOST MY BOOKS BECAUSE OF YOU!!!! DANGEROUSLY IDIOTIC "feature"!!!!!!!!

content: I tried a few apps, this one works the most aggressively. Other apps auto displayed random stuff I didn't want displayed, this one auto grabbed my downloads from e-mail and sorted them into It's library. The free version midnight theme is blinding at night, I paid the $3 so I could make the text almost as dark as the background. Looking forward to reading in the dark some more.

replyContent: Hi, install Lithium Pro again from the store (along with the normal Lithium app) and you'll have Pro again. You should not need to purchase it again.

content: One of the best reading apps...
Perfeito

This is the best ePub reader. Simple, well-designed UI with just enough customization. I bought the pro version to support the dev and offer a small suggestion: With the flow set to "scrolled," it would be nice to have a scroll bar appear on the side when scrolling, relative to the current section I'm in. I read a lot of anthologies of short stories and this would give visual feedback on how far along I am in a specific story or chapter.
It's pretty much all I wanted in an epub reader except... no main screen dark theme. When its 1am and I want to read, it burns my eyes! If you get that, it'll hit every mark!

Despite some minor issues, this is my favorite e-reader app out of the numerous that I've tried. The only two issues I have are: 1) not being able to sync/backup the actual books, really important feature that needs to be added 2) the page slider at the bottom can interfere if you use swipe gestures, I've lost the page I was on multiple times because the page slider shifted when I was only trying to swipe out of the app, maybe include the option to have the slider on top or to the side?
like it

Really want to give this app 5 stars, but I can not. Very responsive; easy; simple; minimalistic and beautiful layout/interface. I paid for this so i can sync books to Google drive. I connected Drive, and the app shows that it's syncing. I don't see anything synched to my drive though. There are no new files there. Why is this?
replyContent: The files are in a special area of Drive that's not visible to the user or other apps. You can see how much space it's taking on the Drive website under Settings > Manage apps.

A very simple design. Adding or removing books has not been unnecessarily complicated, it is as simple as one can get. content: Love this app and like the options of picking my background color in the pro edition. Highly recommend this to anyone that reads offline.

I tried a lot of epub readers before settling on this one. I love everything about it, except that it's sometimes impossible to remove a misplaced highlight. And selecting text for highlighting can be a challenge.

Love this app, bought the pro version to support the dev. For some reason, however, I'm seeing no option for custom themes on my device (Galaxy Tab S2). I'm sure it's just a coding hiccup, but this is the main reason I upgraded, and I'm a little disappointed. EDIT: Found the themes menu. Just wasn't where I expected it to be. This one's on me!
I've been using the free version for about a year so I thought I'd support the creators. My only wish is for a different way to organize the books.

Best book reader for mobiles. Just a wish: Put the dictionary first when a word is selected. Not with a second click. At least as an option. I mean, maybe we could have the option to see the dictionary as the first thing when we select a word, then highlighting colors with the pull down arrow.
bought to support the developer. because.... this is awesome. I wish this app have feature to showing that this book already read and finish. hihihi inlovr this app so far.
syncing with Google drive is good, but local (before pro) annotations were deleted by pro

content: II'm a huge fan of this app, its definitely one of the best readers and since I exclusively read .epubs, a program that renders them PROPERLY is so important. Used the normal because I didn't know there was a pro vers.! Customisable colours is one of the things I was sorely missing. One the things I don't like is in the paged reading method there is page animation. Can you add an option to have no animation at all. When you next page it just appears. Animation is gimmicky and distracting. (I think)  Please add map-able click areas. Like currently left is back, right is next and that's it. What if you wanted to click top and bottom instead? or be able to go back and forth from both sides. (eg. top left and right is back, bottom left and right is forward). I say because I read on phone and tablet and holding the device is not always in the same hand or position. So being able to navigate easily and quickly is better. (See the manga reader "perfect viewer" to get what i mean). Haven't tried the syncing thing yet but will definitely try!  I think some of the UI could do with a bit more work. The 'bookshelf' is a bit boring and too small to read some titles. More details please!
Just bought this to support the devs. Keep doing a great job. I just hope one day that they will support syncing books as well and not just reading data.
Same as other commenters didn't have an actual need to buy the pro app because dev doesn't restrict much on the actual free version. Bought it in support of a well designed app, simple and neat.
this app is my companion to read all my wuxia/xianxia novels! simple, non-intrusive and it works really great! bought the pro version to support the devs. thank you for all your good work!
Freaking awesome. Bought pro just to thank the developers for their great work :)

I Bought the Pro license for the synchronization feature but it did not work properly. I would like to read a book on a smartphone and a tablet but there is no change with the free version (i have activated the sync with my gdrive account on the two devices)
replyContent: Hi, can you send me an email at faultexceptionapps@gmail.com?

content: I really love this app. It makes ready easier. Also, there are no ads even in the free version. As other users said, I don't need the premium features. I only wanted to help the developer.
I had the free version, worked okay. I paid to upgrade and there is no difference whatsoever. I believe nothing has changed. Do I have to do something to activate the upgrade. Roy G
Just bought the pro just the support the devs. Please add more book formats like mobi. And please add book backup. It will be totally useful for us. Kudos :)
I didn't really need the Pro version but I'm so pleased with the app that I bought it to support the devs. Great work, guys!
Simple is AWESOME.
Thank you very much for this neat eBook reader! I wish you would add text to speech soon. :) It's the only feature left that I need and this app will be perfect.
Best reading app on Android. Bought pro just to support the developer.

I downloaded this because kindle kept forcing me to the beginning of my ebooks if they were not purchased from them. Meant that I had to constantly try to find my place again every time. Don't really need the pro features, but it works so well I wanted to support the dev. Only thing that I think would improved it is additional support for file types like .pdf.
Awesome work, bought it just to support the devs. Keep up the good work ☺

Really great app and the best of a dozen I already tried. For only reading and possibility to higlight and add notes it is totally enough and also the text is readable very well. I bought it only to support the dev. Althought I think it is the best app on the market I only gave it just 4 stars because I am missing more features to get quick explanations about unknown words. I like it that there is a tranalation feature however it would be much better to have it directly accessible with one or max. two klicks (currently it is three klicks which is ok however when reading more demanding texts in foreign langugages each additional klick becomes very tiring). Really hope you can improve this! Update 20181003: ok, understood, also got the define button now beside the translate button. Maybe there is a way to show those two button directly when clicking in a link instead of havin to klich on the arrow?
replyContent: There isn't actually a translation feature, you probably have an app like Google Translate installed and Lithium supports actions from other apps on Android 6+. In the same way, you can install the Dictionary.com app and a "Define" action will show up there too and launch into that app.

content: It would be very helpful if all the texts one higlights could be collected in Google Keep or some other place so that we could reach our highlighted texts from PC and such.
Awesome

The free version's more than enough for me, but I just decided to support the devs. If I could make one request - some ebook covers are blank and I hope we could download covers like in Moon Reader. No biggie, but it would just make the bookshelf more aesthetically-pleasing.
replyContent: Do your books have covers on the inside at the beginning and are just missing them in the bookshelf, or no cover in the book either?

content: Very nice epub reader, among the best reader in rendering books. I particularly like how notes are handled, allowing more enjoyable reading of ebooks with a lot of notes (such as a science ebook). The only problem I have found so far is that it's rather difficult to update an epub that has been read. Replacing the file outside the reader caused error when opening it. I deleted the epub thru the app then copied the new file over thru USB but got 'No new book' when trying to refresh the library. Perhaps not a common problem as few would create/update epub books as I do.
replyContent: What error did it cause?

content: Had another reader that couldn't find my files but this one immediately synced everything and I decided to buy the pro version to support the devs. Thank you!!
To support the devs..keep up the good work
Excellent app. I bought this to support the developer.
I wanted to support the developers. Extraordinary.

Simply the best epub reader, the only one that opens all my epubs and 
properly displays all the pictures/graphs/equations. Bought pro to support 
developer.

I like this app. Simple. But it works the way i want it to. Bought pro to 
support the developer.

Brought this solely to support the developer. Hoping for more great updates 
in the future!

I also purchased this app because I like the original and wanted to support 
the developer. However, I cannot figure out how to get to the display 
settings to use the themes. My settings within the app do not have a 
display settings option
replyContent: Open a book, then tap the page, then tap the A/gear icon at the top to access display settings.

content: Hi Guys, I live your app, and paid for it to support you, but I cannot install the pro version to my phone. Is it allowed to use it only on one device? Update: After few days, it was possible to install to the other device. I guess it was a google play issue. Thanks!
replyContent: No, you can install it on other devices. Please email me at faultexceptionapps@gmail.com with details on what happens when you try.

content: Features are nice but supporting the development is more important

Didn't need the extra features but wanted to pay to show support for the 
developer

I have no need for the Pro features, as the free version is already 
excellent. I am purely buying this to support the developer.
I love this app especially their added themes!!

Bought it to support my fav reading app devs.keep it up guys you are tge 
best
Supporting the dev..
Lithium Pro "not installed" after purchase.
replyContent: Pro works as a Pro license to the normal app. You continue to launch Lithium like you have before and you'll have the Pro features as long as Pro is installed. You can't actually launch Pro after the first time (which redirects you to the normal app).

content:
Thank you for making the best epub reader. Bought it to support the devs. 
Thank you.

Would love to see more book formats like .mobi supported. This reader is 
lightweight, battery-friendly, looks easy on the eyes, and very fast. 
Enough customization options to make it feel personal and not too much that 
you feel lost. This app doesn't try to be a fully fledged book manager, and 
focuses instead on great reading experience, and that part it nails.

A wonderful app, but, one thing I would love to see, is the option to have 
sub categories,in the category
Thanks for crafting such a lean app

This is the best lightweight reader apps that I ever tried! The Material 
design surely pleasing to the eye, and the simple interface keep me 
focused. Bought the Pro just because the devs are worth it. There's a 
little suggestion though; is it possible to add font selection and other 
configurations to custom themes? Because that would be perfect!

I buy this app because i like the free version. Can i request a feature 
that enable the user to manually put custom css?
Worth every cent, best epub imo
Simple and good product.

It's really great, I love it. Very customisable, runs as smooth and in some 
cases smoother than the more popular ebook readers. Only downside is I wish 
the book list view was more customisable, I love wooden bookshelves. But 
the app makes up for it in so many other ways that it is a non issue. The 
developers did a really great job on this and great value for money too 
that it didn't take me long to decide to buy the pro version. Thanks for 
the app!
Excellent

Recently, Purchased Licence To Support Dev. First, Thanks For Clean, 
Minimal User Centric Reading App.

Pro is NOT NEEDED. But I still buy it. Why? Because it's THAT GOOD. It's 
free but I want to pay. So I pay. If you have no money, the free version is 
already epic. Super easy to customize and the clean layout is really 
pleasing
Amazing epub reader, period.  I didn't need the pro version, but decided to support the dev for such an awesome, simple reader that just works, unlike so many others out there to choose from. A++++
Didn't really need it. The free app is perfect. Here to show support :)
Very good app

========================== This app has all the features that a bibliophile would need. - Automatic scanning of card for epub files. - A clean & simple user interface. - Easily readable text. - Highlighting and notes. - Classy look and feel. - Plus it's ad-free. -------------------------------------------------- Bought it for the same reason as others; to support the developers.. ========================== Although this app has a web search feature to look for the meaning of the selected word, it would have been great if there were an inbuilt dictionary.. Looking forward to the same in the next update.. ===========================
I upgraded to the pro version but this ebook reader wont import my books. I dont know whats wrong with it... other ebooks can import it. Pls fix it.
replyContent: Are they EPUB files and are they on your SD card or device storage?

content: Been using the free version for a while now.  Upgraded to support the dev.  Overall perfect!
Simple clean no adds
This is my favorite ebook reader so I had to get the pro version to support the developers.
Awesome!
Love to clean interface. Would love to see up/down gesture for brightness control. Otherwise this is perfect. Thank you!

Great app. Among ereaders it has the best interface. Feature requests: most of the books I read as Epubs are for school, and it would be SO helpful if you could export annotations (the sentences I underline and highlight, listed with some kind of page number). Otherwise I have to take notes by hand and type then in later. Also it would be helpful for note taking if the page number displayed somewhere on the reading screen.
Good
Bought the pro just to show support to the dev.great app. Would love a dictionary feature.
I would like to be able to choose where this app stores files

Nice layout and ability to scroll down page like modern websites, instead of flipping pages like kindle. This is very important if you want to select text that spans pages, for instance, which is nearly impossible with the Kindle app.  NOTE: if you do select text to add a note, the only way you can copy that note out is by reading it off the screen and typing it into a more standards-based app. There is no way to export or even copy-paste the text.
Ok. However i paid for the pro ,but not getting the added features. Why ?
replyContent: Responded to email.

content: This app is great. So simple and easy to use. Looks great. I bought the pro version to support the developer. All the features I need are in the free version, but this is such a great app and the dev listens to feedback so I wanted to contribute. Thanks for a great job.
Please, please Make a library where we can store books, and our notes even if our mobile gets lost. We want a sign in feature please.
Upgrading not so much for the extra features, but because this is simply the best and cleanest epub reader for Android out there. But would appreciate the ability to delete highlights, thank you!
Excellent, simple, yet powerful e-reader. Not millions of options,  but only the right and useful ones. Simple is beautiful.
Amazing app, the pro version just let me pay the devs for the awesome app. The custom themes are nice too
The pro features make the app much better at a reasonable cost.  Still need a dictionary and grid layout thumbnails are much too large.
Simplesmente o melhor!!!  Na verdade só comprei a versão paga para apoiar o projeto, os desenvolvedores merecem.
Great epub reader! Any plans on adding a page turning effect similar to Google play books?

This reader is an example of simple is best. It's the first one that managed to read all my books from the "standard" eBooks folder! Why others can't do this simple thing?!  It allows me to add notes and highlights, and browse them too. One thing I would love to see is library wise search, so that I can find a book based on keywords, or notes. Tag based browsing/search would be great too. Otherwise, keep up the good work.

Didn't need the pro feature at all, such a great and generous developer. Just bought the pro as a way to extend my thanks.   Feature request: Cloud syncing either with Dropbox so that I can read it on multiple devices.
Scrolling feature is unique, which is why I use this app. The Google Play Books app has better fonts, and I so wish I could use Literata in Lithium. Please allow custom fonts or add more serif fonts

Edit: Its okay now!  Thanks! The customization is great! I've been using this app for quite a while now because I enjoy reading Light Novels, and most of them are available for free in EPUB format. So this app is the best for all of the EPUB reading app that I've have tried. Looking forward for many other features!

Great app! I mainly read books on programming topics and this is the first e-reader app that's had any remotely good in terms of keeping the code looking good, and the only one with any syntax hilighting. But I have a few requests: I've only seen it to this in the "light" theme, and I usually prefer to use a dark theme; and it won't scale up or down when I change the font size. Both would be incredibly helpful. For reference, the book that's been doing this well is Eloquent Javascript in the EPUB format, and I'm on a Galaxy S6.
replyContent: Please send the file to faultexceptionapps@gmail.com.

content: I upgraded to Pro to be able to use additional features, but I am unable to use them.  Highlighting feature does not work.
replyContent: Please send more info to faultexceptionapps@gmail.com

content: I only purchased pro version to support developer. Very happy with free version, best reader out they
A very good app not straining the device. Can improve to support more ebook formats. Tks.
Unlike FBReader, works well with a large library.  Only feature missing that I care for is the ability to select custom fonts.

So pleased with this. Didn't need any of the pro features but bought it to support the dev. Very clean, simple, intuitive, and exactly what I needed. Text is easy to read and everything just works. Highly polished app. Please don't change it too much with future updates, it's perfect the way it is now 11/26/2017. Thanks for this app!  Edit: any plans to bring this to the windows 10 app store? Can't find anything remotely as good as this.
Add more colors tts support and let us customize background
Excellent: straightforward and uncomplicated; best eBook reader I've found.

Great app! This is the app I stuck with after trying EVERY one in the play store. Way better than Moon+ and Prestigio, and the other ones are not even worth considering. A dictionary would be really nice though.
I tried refund but money doesn't credits my account....
replyContent: Email me the order ID.

content: Great ebook reader. Tried a few before testing this one and all the previous readers rendered the books incorrectly. Went in for pro and have my pages set up nicely with an off-white yellow tint background and charcoal font. Feels comfortable to read! I hope this app continues to stay minimalist. Great work!

Best epub reader out there, IMO.  I *love* the clean interface, the ability to continuously scroll through a chapter (instead of page-turns), and how simple and non-distracting the app is.  I've tried at least a half dozen, and this is my favorite.  The custom theme setup is okay, but honestly I bought the premium one just to support the dev.  Wishlist: - other file type support (mobi, pdf) - label search results by chapter (as highlights and bookmarks are) - option to not change font size on highlighting.
replyContent: Font size isn't supposed to change with highlighting. It sounds like the book you're reading is being a little overzealous with it's styling. Please send that book to faultexceptionapps@gmail.com so I can check it.

content: Use lithium for daily reading on my phone for a couple months. This is REALLY GREAT epub reader I ever used with simple UI.  Just saw this pro version of the app. So I immediately buy this to support developer to keep making this good work.
Lithium Pro doesn't work. It keeps going back to the free app. Please refund my money.
replyContent: Pro unlocks features in the free app, it isn't an app of it's own. It goes back to Lithium and then you can use custom themes.

content: Love this app.  Simple with no bloat.  No book store, no ads.  Does an excellent job at reading and formatting epub.  The one feature that I would like in the pro version is to have a library sync function preferably with Google drive and Dropbox.
Awesome app.
Thanks. What a great app. Happy to support developer.
